short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle the announcement banner on & off on the Find Work page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide the Announcements banner on the "Find Work" page by default. You may toggle the banner on to see announcements.

This project is Open Source! Please feel free to submit requests for features, or make your own contributions.

You may contact me through the support link on this page (click the "Visit Support Hub" button on this page, below) or via GitHub: https://github.com/Jamesllllllllll/Upwork-Optimizer-Chrome-Extension
